item.title: Why The Death Of The Wells Fargo Employee Found At Work Is So Jarring - Forbes
item.description:
1. Why The Death Of The Wells Fargo Employee Found At Work Is So Jarring  Forbes
  2. A woman clocked in for work at Wells Fargo on Friday at 7 a.m. 4 days later, she was found dead at her desk.  12news.com KPNX
  3. It took Wells Fargo 4 days to notice that an employee had died in their cubicle  Fortune
  4. Wells Fargo employee found dead in cubicle four days after clocking in  The Washington Post
  5. Wells Fargo worker found dead at her desk four days after clocking in  The Guardian US
